required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluating PCSK9 Binding antiBody Influence oN coGnitive HeAlth in High cardiovascUlar Risk Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled, Multicenter Study to Assess the Effect of Evolocumab on Cognitive Function in Patients With Clinically Evident Cardiovascular Disease and Receiving Statin Background Lipid Lowering Therapy: A Study for Subjects Enrolled in the FOURIER (Study 20110118) Trial

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates change over time in neurocognitive testing in subjects receiving statin therapy in combination with evolocumab (AMG 145), compared with subjects receiving statin therapy in combination with placebo.

study_design_info.masking: Double Blind (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from baseline over time in Spatial Working Memory (SWM) index of executive function
primary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of data collected over the study duration (up to 4 years)
primary_outcome.description: Mean Change from baseline over time in Spatial Working Memory (SWM) index of executive function

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from baseline over time in Spatial Working Memory (SWM) between-errors score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of data collected over the study duration (up to 4 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Mean Change from baseline over time in Spatial Working Memory (SWM) between-errors score

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from baseline over time in Paired Associated Learning (PAL) total errors adjusted.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of data collected over the study duration (up to 4 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Mean Change from baseline over time in Paired Associated Learning (PAL) total errors adjusted.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from baseline over time in Reaction Time (RTI) median 5-choice reaction time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of data collected over the study duration (up to 4 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Mean Change from baseline over time in Reaction Time (RTI) median 5-choice reaction time

arm_group.description: Evolocumab (AMG145) Q2W or QM plus effective statin dose
Placebo Q2W or QM plus effective statin dose

intervention.description: Effective statin therapy defined as greater than or equal to atorvastatin 20 mg or an equivalent statin

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Randomized into Study 20110118 (FOURIER)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Current or known past diagnosis of dementia or mild cognitive impairment (MCI)
